# VEHICLE::SET_VEHICLE_DOOR_BROKEN

## Summary
Breaks a vehicle door

## Parameters
* **VEHICLE_INDEX** vehicle
* **SC_DOOR_LIST** doorNumber
* **BOOL** dissapear

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
doorId: see SET_VEHICLE_DOOR_SHUT
